sentences.sContent: For you too are Gods in creation, sparks of the Divine becoming violet flames of the All That Is.
sentences.sContent_eng: For you too are Gods in creation, sparks of the Divine becoming violet flames of the All That Is.
sentences.sCn: 因为你们也是在创造的神，是形成【所有所是】的紫罗兰火焰的神之火花。

phrases.pCn: 羞怯的人；畏首畏尾的人
甲基紫；龙胆紫；甲紫（消毒防腐药）

remMethod.val: vio ＋ let(让) → 让紫罗兰尽情开放吧 → 紫罗兰； 形似： violent(adj. 暴力的)

trans.tranOther: a plant with small dark purple flowers, or sometimes white or yellow ones
